name: PARKER (AsmanaDev)
description:
my social medias:

Twitch: AsmanaPlays

YouTube: AsmanaPlays

the file will be downloaded from mega.io

plz post if any bugs idc about glitches just bugs

!!SPOILER ALERT!!

Hello PARKER, You are in an annoying parkour simulation, there are many levels and challenges ahead, good luck, and don't fall  >:)

Story:

Chapter 0 level: tutorial, clouds

Tutorial story:

This is a new place!

With parkour?!?!

Your not even you anymore,  your now PARKER TEST!

Yes this is telling you how everything works.

So its WASD to move and SPACE to jump.

Ok this parkour is pretty easy.

Oh more text!

It says about crouching.

Control to crouch, ok.

YOU ARE SPEED THROUGH THE GAPS!!!

Oh even more text!

It says about sprinting.

Its SHIFT ok.

WEEE YOU ARE SANIC!

Ok more parkour, and done!

Oh what's this?

You complete the parkour first try because its easy and you are a pro gamer ofc and touch the malfunctioning Level Pad, you don't know what it is though..

When you step on it, BAM a new course...

chapter 1, level 1-2, sky

Level 1 story:

When you touched that pad, you arrived here.

You wake up as PARKER(yourself) and realise you are in a simulation of parkour?!

You also realise you are in the sky so if you fall, there is no going back, unless..

You complete the parkour first try again and touch the Level Pad again

Level 2 story:

When you touched that Level Pad, you arrived here!

You realise you are in a tower.. of hell

This is the HARDEST PARKOUR TOWER OF GAMINGS HISTORY!

Good luck with this one, you'll need it..

Oh you beat it?

You press another Level Pad..

Chapter 2, level 3-?, space

Level 3 story:

Ok it took you here

Ok this simulation is just weird, now your in space, what happened PARKER?

There is also moving items, I guess that makes sense you are in space after all!

This parkour is child's play, something is up the Developer's sleeves for the upcoming levels...

Level 4 story:

You are back in the sky, but in another easy course, what is even happening PARKER?

You beat the level in like 12 seconds, but you notice something, odd..

The Level Pad is turning like the cubes from the last level of this weird simulation.

That's it for now bois, make sure to download it.. or else you wont have fun haha!
